english.segment1: So this is how the story goes. I want everybody to know. We love Skittles and Combos. So bring some to our next show.
english.segment2: From our head down to our toes. We love Skittles and Combos. So if you want to see our faces glow. Just bring some to our next show.
english.segment3: Deny us Combos. Refuse us Skittles. I admit those words hurt a little. But we know it'll be okay. If you just send some our way
english.segment4: [spoken]. Mmm thats it mm it makes me hungry ha. It makes you hungry too
